value.0: This thick blackish brew swirls silently with a glowing radiance in its specially crafted flask. Behind the rich caramel and vanilla flavoring, Soul Tonic is magically sealed with the lifeforces of sentient creatures. It is used to reinvigorate the consumer by infusing their bodies with stolen life energies which regenerates skin and organ tissue beyond the normal scope of natural healing. Initial use of the tonic results in euphoric sensations that dulls the senses from pain and excites the individual. Prolonged use of the tonic extends the lifespan of the consumer, even halting the aging process, unless discontinued from use. Soul Tonic is highly addictive after the first consumption. Withdrawl from the product typically leads to convulsions in muscle joints up to one week or more.
